1427750.name: Remothered: Broken Porcelain Soundtrack
1427750.description: The Original Soundtrack of Remothered: Broken Porcelain, 2nd chapter of the acclaimed survival horror game by Darril Arts, developed by Stormind Games and published by Modus Games, is composed by award-winning Luca Balboni (Mine, An Affair to Die For and Remothered: Tormented Fathers) with vocal performances by Satomi Yanagibashi and Nina de Lianin. The typical Italian sound style combined with ethnic vocals and folk instruments is a mixture of romance, drama and terror.
